articles.title: 'If not for 400, my job is to score 600 runs to get India selectors' attention' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Post the Sri Lanka tour last year, he was never picked again for an India assignment. But the Kolkata Knight Riders star has set his eyes on India return for the 2023 ODI World Cup.
articles.content: One of the many reasons behind India's dominance across formats in the past few years has been their ability to add depth to the squad and create a pool of talent. Much has been owing to the Covid-19… [+1979 chars]
